overview: Get a load of Triga’s new double bill spunk fest Turbo Power. Who doesn’t love a couple of foul mouthed Turbo Powered boy racers? In part one of our latest production best mates Darren and Ste meet up for an afternoon drinking session and their filthy minds soon turn to sticking some hard core porn on the telly. After a few glasses of the hard stuff it’s a case of any hole is a goal.
title: Turbo Power
